introduction-text.quote: "[...]Every solution for every problem does allready exist. We just have to find it.[...]"
introduction-text.description: Hi! I´m René Heller, a Frontend Developer and the quote above is literally my mindset. Now I´m 34 years old, based near Berlin, Germany, and learned a profession which matches my passion. I´m looking forward to help you to create the design as well as the logic you desire for your website!

left-contact-section.title: Contact
left-contact-section.subtitle: Facing a challenge or have a project in mind?
left-contact-section.description: Feel free to send me a message through this form. I'm eager to connect and have a chat about your ideas. Let me offer my skills and dedication to support the progress of your projects.

right-contact-section.checkbox-text: I have read the Privacy Policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

skill-text: While building several Projects I got myself familiar with the following technologies.

purple-line-box.title: Portfolio
purple-line-box.subtitle: Let me show you my most recent projects - feel free to try them out.
